text: Sant'Egidio may refer to: * St. Giles (640?–720?) * Community of Sant'Egidio, an international Christian lay community * Sant'Egidio, Rome (Trastevere), the church from which the community of Sant'Egidio takes its name * Sant'Egidio (Mantua), a church in Mantua, Italy ==Placenames== * Sant'Egidio alla Vibrata, a comune in the province of Teramo, Abruzzo * Sant'Egidio del Monte Albino, a comune in the province of Salerno, Campania * Sant'Egidio, a hamlet of the comune of Ferrara
title: Sant'Egidio
